content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-17.7766, 22.7766)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric pole at position (-17.7766, 22.7766)

### Lab at position(-19.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (-19.5, 23.5)

### Assembling machine at position(-19.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (-19.5, 23.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to place entities
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities blocking the placement.

### Errors when reconnecting power
- Confirm that the target entities (lab and assembling machine) are within the power range of the electric pole before attempting to reconnect them.
